author: CBC News
title: Canada among countries moving to block Russian access to SWIFT | CBC News
description: Western nations, including Canada, announced sweeping new sanctions against Moscow on Saturday, including kicking some Russian banks off the main global payments system
content:
Western allies announced sweeping new sanctions against Moscow on Saturday, including kicking some Russian banks off the main global payments system.
